channel.title: Dingoo on Tardigrade's dev blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dingoo on Tardigrade's dev blog

item.title: [Dingoo] DinguxCommander
item.description: DinguxCommander DinguxCommander is a dual-panel file manager for Dingoo A320 (Dingux). Download: DinguxCommander_v2.1.tar.gz Source: DinguxCommander_v2.1_src.tar.gz Features: Copy, move and delete multiple files. View a file Execute a file Rename a file/dir Create a new directory Display disk space used by a list of selected files/dirs Display disk information (used, available) For more information, see file README.txt.

item.title: [Dingoo] Slitherlink
item.description: Slitherlink is a logic puzzle game created in 1989 by Japanese publisher Nikoli, famous for creating Sudoku, among many other puzzle games. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slitherlink for more info. I discovered the game a few years ago on the Nintendo DS with ‘Puzzle Series Vol. 5: Slitherlink’, which was never released outside of Japan. It’s such a good game I grew addicted to it, just like with Picross and Nurikabe. This is my version of the game for Dingux (Dingoo Linux).
